channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Measuring Innovation in Education 2019 - What Has Changed in the Classroom?
item.description: Measuring Innovation in Education 2019 - What Has Changed in the Classroom? by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Monday 28 January 2019 at 10:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 28 January 2019 at 10:00.

item.title: Saving Costs in Chemicals Management - How the OECD Ensures Benefits to Society
item.description: Saving Costs in Chemicals Management - How the OECD Ensures Benefits to Society by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Monday 28 January 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Pratiques Fiscales Dommageables - Rapport d'étape de 2018 sur les régimes préférentiels - Cadre inclusif sur le BEPS : Action 5
item.description: Pratiques Fiscales Dommageables - Rapport d'étape de 2018 sur les régimes préférentiels - Cadre inclusif sur le BEPS : Action 5 by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Tuesday 29 January 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 29 January 2019 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Harmful Tax Practices - 2018 Progress Report on Preferential Regimes - Inclusive Framework on BEPS: Action 5
item.description: Harmful Tax Practices - 2018 Progress Report on Preferential Regimes - Inclusive Framework on BEPS: Action 5 by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Tuesday 29 January 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 29 January 2019 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Australia 2019
item.description: OECD Environmental Performance Reviews: Australia 2019 by Environment Directorate has an embargo on Wednesday 30 January 2019 at 3:00 and a launch event planned on Wednesday 30 January 2019 at 3:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Hungary 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Hungary 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 31 January 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: OECD Economic Surveys: Slovak Republic 2019
item.description: OECD Economic Surveys: Slovak Republic 2019 by Economics Department has an embargo on Tuesday 5 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 5 February 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Rethinking Innovation for a Sustainable Ocean Economy
item.description: Rethinking Innovation for a Sustainable Ocean Economy by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Thursday 14 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Thursday 14 February 2019 at 11:00.
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry

item.title: How's Life in the Digital Age? - Opportunities and Risks of the Digital Transformation for People's Well-being
item.description: How's Life in the Digital Age? - Opportunities and Risks of the Digital Transformation for People's Well-being by Statistics and Data Directorate has an embargo on Tuesday 26 February 2019 at 11:00 and a launch event planned on Tuesday 26 February 2019 at 11:00.

item.title: Going Digital Synthesis Report - Making Digital Transformation Work for Growth and Well-being
item.description: Going Digital Synthesis Report - Making Digital Transformation Work for Growth and Well-being by Directorate for Science, Technology and Industry has an embargo on Monday 11 March 2019 at 9:00 and a launch event planned on Monday 11 March 2019 at 9:00.
